term.title: polymer compatibilizer

item.text: Polymericadditive that, when added to a blend of immiscible polymers, modifies their interfaces and stabilizes the blend.

notes.item: Typical polymer compatibilizers are block or graft copolymers.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 889. 'Definitions of terms relating to reactions of polymers and to functional polymeric materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' on page 901 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476040889)
